references.paper_title: SymILO: A Symmetry-Aware Learning Framework for Integer Linear Optimization
references.reason: This is the main paper for which the top 5 references are being identified.
This paper provides foundational knowledge on the symmetry of ILPs, which is central to the proposed SymILO framework.

references.paper_title: Exact combinatorial optimization with graph convolutional neural networks
references.reason: This paper introduces a graph neural network (GNN)-based approach for solving ILPs, which serves as a baseline method for comparison in this work.

references.paper_title: Solving mixed integer programs using neural networks
references.reason: This is another important baseline in this work.

references.paper_title: Accelerating primal solution findings for mixed integer programs based on solution prediction
references.reason: This paper is a key reference for the classic supervised learning task of predicting optimal solutions for ILPs, providing a solid foundation for comparison.
